description: From a blend of stoved (“stewed”) + tatties (“potatoes”).

entries.meaning: A traditional Scottish dish of stewed potatoes and onions with cold meat.
examples: At home, after the fun of Dookin′ for Apples was over we sat round a huge dish of delicious stovies, which had cooked very slowly on the top of the stove in a covered pan, with salt and pepper and knobs of butter. Threepenny bits and charms were hidden in the stovies.
